description.line2: Cybersecurity incident tracking systems are the tools and processes used to detect, report, and manage cyber-attacks and security breaches . These systems help organizations identify potential threats, respond to incidents, and prevent future attacks.

maincontent: Cybersecurity incident tracking systems are the tools and processes used to detect, report, and manage cyber-attacks and security breaches . These systems help organizations identify potential threats, respond to incidents, and prevent future attacks.
